questions.question: Has the user completed at least one transaction every week for the past 8 weeks?
questions.criteria: Measures consistency in transaction history over time

questions.question: Is the latest account balance update within the last 7 calendar days?
questions.criteria: Ensures data reflects recent balance changes

questions.question: Has the user made investment transactions in at least two distinct asset classes in the last 30 days?
questions.criteria: Evaluates diversity of recent investment activity

questions.question: Does the data include a recorded risk tolerance level corresponding to the user’s current portfolio?
questions.criteria: Confirms presence of personalized risk profile data

questions.question: Are there at least three recurring transaction amounts recorded in the past 60 days?
questions.criteria: Identifies regular versus one-time transactions for quality assurance

questions.question: Has the user conducted trading activities in at least three different market sectors during the past 90 days?
questions.criteria: Measures variety in recent trading patterns indicating completeness and quality
